description: Variation of condition  2 (development according to the approved plans) pursuant to planning permission 2017/0834 granted on 02/11/2017 for erection of three storey (plus basement) detached self-contained dwelling. The variation would change the timber cladding to brick.
decision_conditions: <p id="E583" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E583" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation/use of the development.</p><p id="E585" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E585" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E586" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E586" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">a) Details of measures to ensure the protection of trees (including roots) on surrounding land during the course of the demolition and constriction phases of the development hereby approved.</p><p id="E588" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E588" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E589" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E589" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: In the interests of preserving the amenity and biodiversity value of trees surrounding the site.</p>

<p id="E569" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E569" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved, the cross-over which will become redundant as a result of the development hereby approved shall be removed. The works shall only be undertaken by the Local Highway Authority (or by a third party appointed by the Local Highway Authority), and shall be undertaken at the expense of the developer.</p><p id="E571" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E571" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E572" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E572" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: To ensure that an adequate highway environment is provided</p><p><br data-cke-eol="1"></p>

<p id="E556" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E556" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Prior to the commencement of the development, details of secure bicycle storage facilities for 2 cycles, including layout, stand type and spacing, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Such details as approved shall be implemented prior to the occupation of the development and shall thereafter be retained, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.</p><p id="E558" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E558" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E559" is="qowt-word-para" named-flow="FLOW-20" qowt-eid="E559" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: To ensure that adequate provision for the safe and secure</p>

<p id="E542" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E542" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Development Order 2015 (or any Order revoking and re-enacting that Order), planning permission shall be required in respect of any proposed extension to the building that would fall within Class(es) A - E of Part 1 to the second schedule to that Order.</p><p id="E544" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E544" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E545" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E545" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: The addition of extensions to the building has the potential to be harmful to the appearance of this group of buildings and to the amenity of neighbouring occupiers, and so the Council wishes to control the addition of extensions.</p>

<p id="E529" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E529" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Before the use/development commences provision of facilities for the disposal of refuse and recycling shall be made available in accordance with the drawings submitted and retained thereafter.</p><p id="E531" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E531" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E532" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E532" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: To ensure that adequate refuse facilities are available from residents of the proposed development.</p><p><br data-cke-eol="1"></p>

<table is="qowt-table" named-flow="FLOW-6" qowt-eid="E437" class=" cke_show_border"><tbody><tr id="E509" is="qowt-table-row" qowt-eid="E509"><td colspan="1" id="E514" is="qowt-table-cell" qowt-eid="E514" rowspan="1"><p id="E515" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E515" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.</p><p id="E517" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E517" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E518" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E518" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: To protect air quality and people's health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum as a result of the development and to contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedances of National Air Quality Objectives.&nbsp;</p><p id="E520" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E520" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E521" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E521" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E522" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E522" <table is="qowt-table" named-flow="FLOW-6" qowt-eid="E437" class=" cke_show_border"><tbody><tr id="E492" is="qowt-table-row" named-flow="FLOW-12" qowt-eid="E492"><td colspan="1" id="E497" is="qowt-table-cell" named-flow="FLOW-14" qowt-eid="E497" rowspan="1"><p id="E498" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E498" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Full details of the biodiverse green/brown roof (of variable depth between 80mm and 150mm), details of other proposed biodiversity measures (including additional permeable surfaces, utilisation of water buts and further green roofs) and a detailed biodiversity maintenance plan, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, prior to commencement of works on the relevant part of the development hereby approved.</p><p id="E500" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E500" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E501" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E501" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved and shall be fully implemented before the premises are first occupied.</p><p id="E503" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E503" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E504" is="qowt-word-para" named-flow="FLOW-15" qowt-eid="E504" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: To enhance the character and ecology of the development, to provide undisturbed refuges for wildlife, to promote sustainable urban drainage, and to enhance the performance and efficiency of the&nbsp;<span style="background-color: transparent;">proposed building.</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p id="E192" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E192" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined" qowt-paratype="hf-para"><br></p><p id="E199" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E199" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined" <p id="E485" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E485" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Detailed drawings (1:10 and 1:5) and manufacturing information of the envelope materials, openings, railings, green roof and boundary treatment shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before any work on the site is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><p id="E487" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E487" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E488" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E488" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</p>

<p id="E472" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E472" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">Full details, with samples, of the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the buildings, including framed window and glazing, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before any work on the site is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><p id="E474" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E474" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined"><br></p><p id="E475" is="qowt-word-para" qowt-eid="E475" qowt-entry="undefined" qowt-lvl="undefined">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</p>
